events.title: Wine Tasting Evening
events.description: Join us for an exclusive wine tasting event featuring a selection of fine wines from around the world.

events.title: Chef's Special Dinner
events.description: Experience a five-course meal curated by our head chef, showcasing the best of seasonal ingredients.

events.title: Live Jazz Night
events.description: Enjoy an evening of live jazz music while savoring our specially prepared dinner menu.
